conbody.p: You need to activate the License Server in the Katalon Studio Activation dialog.

ol.li: Open the Katalon Studio Activation dialog in Katalon Studio.

ul.li: In the Server URL section, enter the address of your License Server's site that you have configured.
In the Email and Password sections, enter the account you have registered with the Katalon On-Premises License Server.

ol.li: Click Activate to connect with your License Server and retrieve your organizations.
Select an Organization you want to work on, then click OK.
